body:
# Team member

this is a test team member

data.name: Alberto Cresto
data.description: Experienced startup investor. Led over 30 deep tech investments across multiple verticals in the US and the EU. Expertise in buy-side and sell-side M&A, new business development, and corporate venture advisory.

data.name: Cindy Wei
data.description: Bioinformatician and cancer biologist. Experiences in non-profit organisations and IoT / medical device grant management.

data.name: Elad Verbin
data.description: Technologist with +15 years of experience in big tech and emerging technology startups. He founded computer vision ventures, a technology ethics think tank and summit and a blockchain company builder before joining lunar.

data.name: Mick Halsband
data.description: CTO and software architect. Two decades of key roles at startups and multinational leading tech firms. Led software development for embedded mobile, realtime systems, computer graphics, computer vision, and trading infrastructure

data.name: Morris Clay
data.description: Technologist with +15 years of experience in big tech and emerging technology startups. He founded computer vision ventures, a technology ethics think tank and summit and a blockchain company builder before joining lunar.
